TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Semaphore extends System.Threading.WaitHandle
Public NotInheritable Class Semaphore Inherits WaitHandle
public ref class Semaphore sealed : System::Threading::WaitHandle

summary.span: 限制可以同時存取資源或資源集區的執行緒數目。

span.span: Limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來控制存取權的資源集區。Use the class to control access to a pool of resources. 執行緒進入號誌，藉由呼叫方法，都繼承自類別，並藉由呼叫釋放號誌方法。Threads enter the semaphore by calling the method, which is inherited from the class, and release the semaphore by calling the method. 號誌計數會每次在執行緒進入號誌，及執行緒釋放號誌時遞增遞減。The count on a semaphore is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented when a thread releases the semaphore. 當計數為零時，後續的要求封鎖，直到其他的執行緒釋放號誌。When the count is zero, subsequent requests block until other threads release the semaphore. 所有執行緒都釋放號誌，計數為最大值時指定已建立號誌。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 沒有任何的保證的順序，例如 FIFO 或 LIFO，在其中已封鎖的執行緒進入號誌。There is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, in which blocked threads enter the semaphore. 執行緒可以進入號誌多次，藉由呼叫方法重複。A thread can enter the semaphore multiple times, by calling the method repeatedly. 若要釋放部分或所有這些項目，執行緒可以呼叫無參數多的時間，或可以呼叫的方法多載方法多載會指定釋出的項目數目。To release some or all of these entries, the thread can call the parameterless method overload multiple times, or it can call the method overload that specifies the number of entries to be released. 類別不會強制執行呼叫的執行緒識別或。The class does not enforce thread identity on calls to or . 它是程式設計人員的責任在於確保的執行緒沒有釋放號誌太多次。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that threads do not release the semaphore too many times. 例如，假設某個號誌的最大計數為 2，且執行緒 A 和執行緒 B 都進入號誌。For example, suppose a semaphore has a maximum count of two, and that thread A and thread B both enter the semaphore. 如果執行緒 B 中的程式設計錯誤導致呼叫兩次，這兩個呼叫會成功。If a programming error in thread B causes it to call twice, both calls succeed. 此時號誌計數已滿，當執行緒 A 終於呼叫 時，就會擲回 。The count on the semaphore is full, and when thread A eventually calls , a is thrown. 號誌有兩種類型： 本機號誌和具名的系統號誌。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 如果您建立物件使用的建構函式接受名稱，它是與作業系統號誌，該名稱的關聯。If you create a object using a constructor that accepts a name, it is associated with an operating-system semaphore of that name. 具名的系統號誌可在作業系統各處並可用來同步處理程序的活動。Named system semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, and can be used to synchronize the activities of processes. 您可以建立多個物件，代表相同具名系統號誌，而且您可以使用方法來開啟現有的具名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore, and you can use the method to open an existing named system semaphore. 只有在您的程序內，存在本機號誌。A local semaphore exists only within your process. 在處理序內，只要是參考了本機 物件的執行緒，就可使用本機 Mutex。It can be used by any thread in your process that has a reference to the local object. 每個物件是不同的區域號誌。Each object is a separate local semaphore. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立信號的最大計數的三個與初始計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖而等待號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒會使用號誌計數增加至其最大值，讓三個執行緒進入號誌的方法多載。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒使用方法等候一秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加每個執行緒，可讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: initialCount
param.span: 可同時授與給號誌的初始要求數目。

span.span: The initial number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently.

param.name: maximumCount
param.span: 可以同時授與之號誌要求的最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以及指定並行項目的最大數目及選擇性地保留某些項目。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化未命名的號誌。This constructor initializes an unnamed semaphore. 使用這類號誌的執行個體的所有執行緒都必須都有執行個體的參考。All threads that use an instance of such a semaphore must have references to the instance. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，結果是相同的目前執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您不想要保留之執行緒建立號誌的任何項目，使用相同號碼`maximumCount`和`initialCount`。If you do not want to reserve any entries for the thread that creates the semaphore, use the same number for `maximumCount` and `initialCount`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個號誌的最大計數，這三個與初始計數為零。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖而等待號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒會使用號誌計數增加至其最大值，讓三個執行緒進入號誌的方法多載。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒使用方法等候一秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加每個執行緒，可讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 initialCount, int32 maximumCount, string name) cil managed

param.span: 可同時授與給號誌的初始要求數目。

span.span: The initial number of requests for the semaphore that can be granted concurrently.

param.name: name
param.span: 具名系統號誌物件的名稱。

span.span: The name of a named system semaphore object.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目數目與並行項目的最大數目，以及選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, and optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化表示具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個物件，代表相同具名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果具名的系統號誌不存在，就會建立初始計數與所指定的最大計數`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已經存在的具名的系統號誌，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不會使用，雖然無效的值仍然會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 如果您需要確定是否具名的系統號誌已建立，請使用改為建構函式多載。If you need to determine whether or not a named system semaphore was created, use the constructor overload instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用這個建構函式多載時，建議的作法是指定相同數目的`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。When you use this constructor overload, the recommended practice is to specify the same number for `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，和建立具名的系統號誌，結果是相同的目前執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and a named system semaphore is created, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 不過，使用這個建構函式多載沒有任何方法來判斷是否已建立了具名的系統號誌。However, with this constructor overload there is no way to determine whether a named system semaphore was created. 如果您指定`null`或為空字串。 `name`，建立本機號誌時，您必須呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 由於具名號誌是在作業系統各處，它們可用來協調資源使用跨處理序界限。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. 如果您想要了解是否有具名的系統號誌，請使用方法。If you want to find out whether a named system semaphore exists, use the method. 方法會嘗試開啟現有的具名號誌，並擲回例外狀況，如果不存在之系統號誌。The method attempts to open an existing named semaphore, and throws an exception if the system semaphore does not exist. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 範例會建立具名號誌的最大計數為 5 與初始計數為 5。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of five. 讓程式三次呼叫方法。The program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會封鎖第三個呼叫。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 放開解除封鎖第二個程式的第一個複本中的一個或多個項目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目物件數目與並行項目的最大數目，選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱，以及指定接收值的變數，指出是否已建立新的系統號誌。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, and specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化表示具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個物件，代表相同具名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果具名的系統號誌不存在，就會建立初始計數與所指定的最大計數`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已經存在的具名的系統號誌，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不會使用，雖然無效的值仍然會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`來判斷是否已建立之系統號誌。Use `createdNew` to determine whether the system semaphore was created. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，和`createdNew`是`true`，結果是相同的目前執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您指定`null`或為空字串。 `name`，建立本機號誌時，您必須呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在此情況下，`createdNew`一律`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 由於具名號誌是在作業系統各處，它們可用來協調資源使用跨處理序界限。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 範例會建立具名號誌的最大計數為 5，且兩個初始計數。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of two. 也就是說，它會保留之執行緒的呼叫建構函式的三個項目。That is, it reserves three entries for the thread that calls the constructor. 如果`createNew`是`false`，讓程式三次呼叫方法。If `createNew` is `false`, the program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會封鎖第三個呼叫。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 放開解除封鎖第二個程式的第一個複本中的一個或多個項目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，然後指定初始項目數目與並行項目的最大數目，選擇性地指定系統號誌物件的名稱，指定接收值的變數 (以指示是否已建立新的系統號誌)，以及指定系統號誌的安全性存取控制。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created, and specifying security access control for the system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要套用至具名的系統號誌的存取控制安全性，建立時，防止控管之號誌的其他程式碼中使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system semaphore when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the semaphore. 這個建構函式初始化表示具名的系統號誌的物件。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 您可以建立多個物件，代表相同具名系統號誌。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果具名的系統號誌不存在，則會建立具有指定的存取控制安全性。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果具名號誌已存在，則會忽略指定的存取控制安全性。If the named semaphore exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端具有對於新建立的完整控制權物件，即使`semaphoreSecurity`拒絕，或將某些存取權授與目前的使用者就會失敗。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `semaphoreSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 不過，如果目前的使用者試圖取得另一個物件代表相同具名號誌，使用建構函式或方法時，Windows 會套用存取控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named semaphore, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果具名的系統號誌不存在，就會建立初始計數與所指定的最大計數`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已經存在的具名的系統號誌，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不會使用，雖然無效的值仍然會造成例外狀況。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`參數，來判斷是否由這個建構函式所建立之系統號誌。Use the `createdNew` parameter to determine whether the system semaphore was created by this constructor. 如果`initialCount`是小於`maximumCount`，和`createdNew`是`true`，結果是相同的目前執行緒已呼叫(`maximumCount`減去`initialCount`) 時間。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您指定`null`或為空字串。 `name`，建立本機號誌時，您必須呼叫建構函式多載。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在此情況下，`createdNew`一律`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 由於具名號誌是在作業系統各處，它們可用來協調資源使用跨處理序界限。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個的最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用號誌的權限，但讀取和變更，號誌上的權限的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限來開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，號誌被開啟來輸入，並釋放所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，它會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity GetAccessControl ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity GetAccessControl() cil managed
Public Function GetAccessControl () As SemaphoreSecurity
public: System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreSecurity ^ GetAccessControl();

summary.span: 為具名系統號誌取得存取控制安全性。

span.span: Gets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

returns.span: 物件，表示具名系統號誌的存取控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security for the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用下列旗標 （使用位元 OR 運算結合） 的組合來搜尋權限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和號誌的權限必須是與開啟權限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. 存取控制安全性區域號誌，是不相關。On a local semaphore, access control security is irrelevant. 如果物件不代表具名的系統號誌，則這個方法會傳回授與任何使用者所有權限的物件。If the object does not represent a named system semaphore, this method returns a object that grants all rights to any user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個的最大計數與拒絕目前使用者的權限使用號誌，但讀取和變更，號誌上的權限的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限來開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 使用來取得系統號誌的存取控制安全性方法。The access control security for the system semaphore is obtained using the method. 變更權限之後，號誌被開啟來輸入，並釋放所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，它會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Opens a specified named semaphore, if it already exists.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Semaphore OpenExisting (string name);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Semaphore OpenExisting(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenExisting (name As String) As Semaphore
public: static System::Threading::Semaphore ^ OpenExisting(System::String ^ name);

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists.

returns.span: 表示具名系統號誌的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試開啟指定的具名號誌。The method tries to open the specified named semaphore. 如果不存在之系統號誌，這個方法會擲回例外狀況而建立之系統號誌。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要建立之系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使會傳回代表的物件相同具名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒進入號誌，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個的最大計數與拒絕的目前使用者的權限使用號誌，但以授與讀取和變更，號誌上的權限的權限的存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but which grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫方法多載。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method overload. 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限來開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，號誌被開啟輸入，並釋放它所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，它會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用所需的安全性存取權，開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, with the desired security access.

returns.span: 表示具名系統號誌的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`參數必須包含旗標以允許的執行緒進入號誌，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 方法嘗試開啟現有的具名號誌。The method tries to open an existing named semaphore. 如果不存在之系統號誌，這個方法會擲回例外狀況而建立之系統號誌。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要建立之系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使會傳回代表的物件相同具名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個的最大計數與拒絕目前使用者的權限使用號誌，但讀取和變更，號誌上的權限的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限來開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，號誌被開啟輸入，並釋放它所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，它會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Release ();
.method public hidebysig instance int32 Release() cil managed
Public Function Release () As Integer
public: int Release();

summary.span: 結束號誌，並傳回上一個計數。

span.span: Exits the semaphore and returns the previous count.

returns.span: 呼叫 方法之前，號誌上的計數。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒通常會使用方法進入號誌，而且它們通常使用這個方法多載來結束。Threads typically use the method to enter the semaphore, and they typically use this method overload to exit. 如果，所擲回方法，不一定表示呼叫執行緒的問題。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一個執行緒中的程式設計錯誤可能導致該執行緒結束次數多於進入號誌。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果目前物件代表具名的系統號誌，使用者必須擁有權限和號誌必須已經開啟與權限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立信號的最大計數的三個與初始計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖而等待號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒會使用號誌計數增加至其最大值，讓三個執行緒進入號誌的方法多載。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒使用方法等候一秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加每個執行緒，可讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Release (int releaseCount);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 Release(int32 releaseCount) cil managed
Public Function Release (releaseCount As Integer) As Integer
public: int Release(int releaseCount);

param.name: releaseCount
param.span: 結束號誌的次數。

span.span: The number of times to exit the semaphore.

summary.span: 以指定的次數結束號誌，並回到上一個計數。

span.span: Exits the semaphore a specified number of times and returns the previous count.

returns.span: 呼叫 方法之前，號誌上的計數。

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果執行緒已進入號誌多次，這個方法多載可讓與某個呼叫還原整個號誌計數。If a thread has entered the semaphore multiple times, this method overload allows the entire semaphore count to be restored with one call. 如果，所擲回方法，不一定表示呼叫執行緒的問題。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一個執行緒中的程式設計錯誤可能導致該執行緒結束次數多於進入號誌。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果目前物件代表具名的系統號誌，使用者必須擁有權限和號誌必須已經開啟與權限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立信號的最大計數的三個與初始計數為零。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 此範例會啟動五個執行緒，封鎖而等待號誌。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主要執行緒會使用號誌計數增加至其最大值，讓三個執行緒進入號誌的方法多載。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每個執行緒使用方法等候一秒，以模擬工作，然後呼叫方法多載來釋放號誌。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加每個執行緒，可讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 號誌計數已達到最大值。

span.span: The semaphore count is already at the maximum value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAccessControl (System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessControl(class System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity semaphoreSecurity) cil managed
public: void SetAccessControl(System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreSecurity ^ semaphoreSecurity);

param.name: semaphoreSecurity
param.span: 物件，表示要套用到具名系統旗號的存取控制安全性。

span.span: A object that represents the access control security to be applied to the named system semaphore.

summary.span: 為具名系統號誌設定存取控制安全性。

span.span: Sets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您只能上設定存取控制安全性表示具名的系統號誌的物件。You can set access control security only on objects that represent named system semaphores. 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和號誌的權限必須是與開啟權限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名號誌的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名號誌。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果號誌不存在，它會建立兩個的最大計數與拒絕目前的使用者使用號誌的權限，但讀取和變更，號誌上的權限的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限來開啟號誌。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更的權限，使用後來輸入，並釋放所需的權限開啟方法，號誌。After the permissions are changed, using the method, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，它會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryOpenExisting (string name, out System.Threading.Semaphore result);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryOpenExisting(string name, [out] class System.Threading.Semaphore& result) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryOpenExisting (name As String, ByRef result As Semaphore) As Boolean
public: static bool TryOpenExisting(System::String ^ name, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Threading::Semaphore ^ % result);

param.name: name
param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

param.name: result
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，如果呼叫成功，則包含 物件，此物件代表具名信號，如果呼叫失敗，則為。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named semaphore if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

param.span: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 開啟指定的具名號誌 (如果已經存在)，並傳回值，指出作業是否成功。

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果已成功開啟具名號誌，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在的具名號誌，這個方法不會建立它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立之系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定具名號誌是否存在，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，如果號誌不存在，擲回例外狀況。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒進入號誌，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method.

param.span: 要開啟之系統號誌的名稱。

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，表示所需的安全性存取。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that represent the desired security access.

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在的具名號誌，這個方法不會建立它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立之系統號誌，已經不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定具名號誌是否存在，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，如果號誌不存在，擲回例外狀況。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. `rights`參數必須包含旗標以允許的執行緒進入號誌，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使會傳回代表的物件相同具名系統號誌。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore.
